product_name: Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Home Trainer Foldable Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: The Vittoria Pro Home Trainer tire is a must for the year-round rider. It's made specifically for the particular loads that occur when cycling and braking on the revolving drums of the rollers.
short_description: The Vittoria Pro Home Trainer tire is a must for the year-round rider. It's made specifically for the particular loads that occur when cycling and braking on the revolving drums of the rollers.
